dynamic_line: A pair of academics are deep in conversation over a shared datapad, they wear colorful capes that would feel at home in an embassy rondure.  You absently follow their conversation from your perch at the bar, until a disagreement about the need of specimens catches your attention.

dynamic_line.yes: Ah! You see, my esteemed colleague here is stubbornly meek!  He insists that we can learn everything we need from stool samples alone!  But I say, if we want to truly understand these alien lifeforms, we need to study them in vivo!  Live specimens, not just mud!"  The other academic is quick to respond, "Puh!  Nonsense!  You just have a macabre fascination with vivisection the gentleman here needs not to enable.
